checksum:file

Full name:

net.ju-n.maven.plugins:maven-checksum-plugin:1.1-SNAPSHOT:file

Description:

Compute specified file checksum digest for all supported checksum algorithms.

This goal is a facility for invoking maven-checksum-plugin through the command line.

Here is an example of use:

mvn checksum:file -Dfile=some-file.zip


Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven 2.0 project to be executed.
  • The goal is thread-safe and supports parallel builds.
  • Since version: 1.0.

Required Parameters

Name Type Since Description
file String 1.0 The file to process.

Parameter Details

file:

The file to process.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Since: 1.0
  • Required: Yes
  • Expression: ${file}
